title: What Has These Spots?
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 51 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 230L
description: Students will learn about animals and the kinds of spots they have in What Has These Spots? This nonfiction book provides an opportunity to compare and contrast information about animals. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases provide support for beginning readers.
reviewWords: animal, cheetah, fawn, lemur, spots, tiny
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
awareness: Blend Onset and Rime                : Blend onset and rime
grammar: Declarative Sentences                : Recognize and use declarative sentences
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Understand and use alphabetical order
